original_text: Then the prophet quickly took away the cloth that covered his eyes. The king recognized that the man was one of the prophets.
korean_text: 그가 급히 자기의 눈을 가린 수건을 벗으니 이스라엘 왕이 그는 선지자 중의 한 사람인 줄을 알아본지라

sentences.original_text: Then the prophet quickly took away
the cloth that covered his eyes
that the man was one of the prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람이 선지자 중 한 명이라는 것을
